issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: Ti.Contacts.showContacts doesn't return firstName and lastName

comments.body:
Hi Hans,

Please can you provide a complete reproducible test case for this? Just something simple we can drop into an app.js and run.

And if you can, perhaps clarify if it's still occurring with 3.0.2 GA.

Thanks!
